Eventually, you grow use to the action of breathing again and you can focus on your surroundings. Apparently, you are inside a wide red room. The walls emit a dim pink glow, just enough to see in front of you. Behind you stands a kind of cocoon, busted by a hole. This is certainly where you have been confined for all this time. You can hear a strange noise in the distance, like if someone was beating a drum regularly. The floor is really soft under your paws, like if it was a quilted material... Hey, wait a minute...
paws? ... You stare at your new hands with horror as the reality strikes you. You are not human any more. You examine each part of your furry body, totally dumbfounded, but you can't deny it: four paws and a tiny tail, you must have morphed into an animal, and from what you can see, probably a little mammal, like a cat or a dog, but it is difficult to tell without a mirror. You try to stay calm and reason, it won't help to panic. Apparently, some alien or whatever else abducted you and locked you up in their base. You don't know what experiments they engaged on you (and you don't prefer to think about it) but now you have the result under your eyes. However, for some reason, this cocoon has released its grip, so you can move freely again, and that's a good news. The first thing you need is help, and apparently you won't find it in this desert room, so you must take an exit by yourself.

You get up and begin your exploration of this strange place. You have some difficulty to walk all four, and you often stumble, having trouble to coordinate your four legs. Moreover, the squishy ground doesn't help, your paws sinking at each step in the strange material, and thus it just worsens your balance. The walls around you seem to follow a Y-shape plan: the hall splits in two tunnels behind you, but converges toward the same point in front of you, so you decide to take this direction: you don't know why, but something tells you it is where you came from, and after all it is more convenient to go on the lone way rather than choose between two ways, with the fear that you take the wrong decision. But moreover, this is where the noise sounds to come, and there is less light on this side, so you think it is safer to get away. The drum beats continuously, its sound almost hypnotic makes you feel a bit dizzy but you fight to stay vigilant. You also notice a strange puff of wind from the same direction, rhythmic too and somewhat synchronized with the beating. You'd like to think the sound comes from the terrestrial surface, but you judge it is improbable. What you hear is probably the engine and the ventilation systems, confirming you are confined in a spaceship. You find it a bit extravagant they have the same breathable air but maybe this was designed on purpose for you. There is also a strange gurgling, that sounds like a plumbing, maybe sewers; but it would be a bit extrapolated to say it.

After a long slow and unsteady walk, you come upon a dead end. All the wall finish in a strange cylindrical shape organ, looking a bit like a valve. But I tell this comparison to stay polite because in fact, it would rather evoke the anal sphincter: the fleshy wall twist in ridges around a kind of recess which seems to lead somewhere further. This is certainly an opening, but it is closed for the moment. You should have figured out it would not be this easy. You have no tools, so you can only rely on your tiny paws. You push in the middle of the hole with all your strength, but this is no use: it is totally shut, you can't put a digit (or rather pad) in there. Wait, if you are an animal now, maybe you could use your claws. You try to bare your claws, but strangely, nothing comes out of your pads. You examine attentively but effectively, it seems you have no claws. Probably a precaution from your abductors. However, you can still count on your jaws: you attempt to bite the valve, until you realize... you have no fangs too. There is only your bare gums to grasp the wall with. You were so confused that you didn't pay attention before, but this is truly what it is. It would be almost comical if it wasn't that dramatic. That changes everything: how will you survive, naked, without claws and fangs. You are more vulnerable than a newborn, in fact. You cry of desperation, beyond all hope, feeling at the mercy of your kidnappers. You punch furiously on the valve, wishing it was the face of these monsters.
It seems this eventually triggers a reaction from your environment : the opening twitches and contracts, while a loud rumble comes from far above. You retreat back, totally curled up in fear, wondering if your little actions may have activated something. The orifice in front of you keeps shaking for a while, then returns to its previous motionless position, while the noise around turns in a quieter whirring. Then, you feel the whole place around shifts a bit, making you jump and roll around, afraid it means they were coming for you, until this finally stops and everything returns normal. You are a bit dizzy, but unharmed. You take note that it is probably a good idea to not touch this thing again. Then, you notice you are back in the middle of the room. Your former egg is already melting, progressively absorbed by the spongy ground. Then, you hear your belly growling, and that recalls you that you are extremely hungry. Your belly had been empty for all your journey in there, and you can't last long without the nutrients from your cocoon. Alas, almost everything of your previous home was already gone, and you didn't see any liquid nearby. You would gleefully feed on the fleshy ground if you could, but it's not with a toothless maw that you will dig very far. You feel a bit depressed on the moment: lost inside an organic spaceship, nude and helpless, you are going to starve, and wait with the hope that your jailer will condescend to give you drinkable food.

At this very desperate moment, when everything appears to be lost, you suddenly smell a strange scent, very enticing. You sniff the air, taking long breaths and opening instinctively your mouth, like if you were flehming. Yes, it is a very pleasant flavor, both delicate and strong. From what you smell, it seems to come from the back of the room, the direction where it splits in two tunnels. It is right that you haven't still explored this part of your prison, fearing what may hide over there. But it is the only remaining option, now, and since you are going to die here, it is worth to give it a try.
You get up, and stare for a while at these two unsettling dark corridors. Once again, your instinct tells you this is where the mystery hides. You sigh, beginning to be very bored with all that, and start your journey up there, well decided to make it all clear.

From the outside, your cat had absolutely not been pleased to find her belly shrunk back to normal when she awoke. Totally desperate, without neither master nor full belly, she had spent some days wandering in your house like a soul in torment, seeking for some remains of food and lazing around, chewing on her melancholy. She didn't know how, but it seemed her belly had totally absorbed you, and thus, she thought you were lost forever. But one morning, she was awaked by a strange feeling very deep down in her abdomen, like a light tickle, exactly in the place where she had stored her master after the unbirthing. For a moment, she thought it was a tactile hallucination, caused by the memory from the intense feeling of the other night. But the more she focused, the clearer this sensation became. There were undoubtedly a small critter which was walking around her womb. Except a sudden parasitic infection, there could be only one explanation: her master wasn't dead, it had just shrunk and was now trapped in her belly. She was very happy and eased for her master; but she didn't understand how and especially why her body had done that. Then, she felt it touch a very sensitive spot, on the side oriented to her vagina. It was really pleasant, and she purred under the feeling. A bit aroused, she instinctively raised her butt to assume the lordosis position, but it seems this dislodge her master of his place, and she feels him come back in the middle of her womb. She is a bit deceived: he must be really small, totally microscopic. How could he give her relief in his situation?
Meanwhile, this little arousal had awoken again the damn itching in her abdomen. The cat rubs nervously the spot above the fur, raging to definitively not be able to cure it herself. However, at this moment, she feels her micro master moving slowly toward the spot, from the inside. There, she has a revelation: could this tiny thing relieve her directly at the source? No, it would be too good to be true. The master is so tiny inside there, so powerless. But he has also the perfect size to crawl in there.

She decides to settles more comfortably in her basket to be prepared for the following, and curls to put her head right on her flank, attentive to the feeling in her belly, tracing the master's progression with a paw while keeping the localization of her itching with the other.
151211122.title: The womb reshape you

choices: You hear a long and strong yowl unmistakable (your cat doesn't talk)
1512111221.content:
You are walking unhesitatingly in the long and dark tunnel. You hear strange motion above you and around, but you don’t really pay attention. What matters is that your environment remains still. However, at the moment you get past the subdivision of the room, the strange loud whirring comes back again. You have no intention to stop for so little, but you remain really vigilant from the instant. You don’t know what deviant trap these aliens may have set up for you.
You can’t see the end of the tunnel and the fleshy walls looks the same as far as you can stare, but you know you are making progress because it is getting slowly darker and narrower as time passes, whereas the air gets hotter. However, the elasticity of the floor makes the trip really tiring, the heat becomes difficult to bear and plus, you are losing forces because of the hunger. You feel more and more weakened, forcing you to make breaks more frequently. But the worst is this whirring, louder and louder as you are going. You have the impression it will make your head explode. Sometimes, it sounds almost familiar, like if you had already heard it somewhere, but you can’t figure it out.
Alas, after hours of courageous hiking in this squishy inferno, you are on your last legs, or rather paws, at the limit of your stamina. There is no escape to death this time, but at least, you tried something. But, at the moment you are resigning, you hear a loud rumble around you, and suddenly, the tunnel leans to the direction you were walking. Is it a maneuver from the aliens, magnanimous or mischievous? Anyway, you are totally helpless while you are sliding downward, rolling like a stupid pinball. Your skid seems unending, travelling miles and miles of tunnel at a high speed, and you would be almost glad to avoid walking this whole distance, if only you could control what is happening. Finally, after a slide of several minutes, you land on a dead end. It seems another valve borders the tunnel, but this one looks like a red wall, with just a slit breaking in the middle, like if it has been damaged. You wonder if it is where your jailers want you to go, and in this case, if it is really wise to go in, but you have not really the choice. The tunnel looks more like a chasm from now, and you can’t back-pedal: it’s either to carry on or to stay here waiting to starve to death. You sigh once again, and resign yourself to dive in the slit, hoping this time is the good for end.

You travel laboriously a moment through a tight duct before to come out in a totally new place. This time, it is smaller, probably the size of your bedroom. The dim pink light looks more intense and relaxing, lighting up walls seeming entirely covered in drapery, which makes the ground this time extraordinary soft and gentle, feeling a bit like velvet. It’s not this flabby material you’ve walked on since the beginning and it is so perfect you could rub against it all day. The air is also more breathable, with a smell both sweet and musky, and this is the thing which calls to your mind. With your sharp sense of smell, you trace the source and come upon a strange rise in the middle of the room. You come closer, climbing a little, and find out a very strange recess at the top: it looks like a kind of fleshy basket, exactly of the perfect size for you. It looks like quilted inside with a pinker and spongier material than the rest of the room. You lean upon the rim and dare to touch it with just a pad. Gosh, you think, it feels so soft, delicate and pleasant; you couldn’t imagine there were so marvelous tactile sensation. Even if it is not wise, you can’t help letting you fall inside: with all your body, it feels even far better. This basket is so cozy, so snug and comfortable. You roll around to maximize the contact: damn, it’s like a combination between the softness of a bed and the warmth of a hot tub. As you sensually investigate, you notice a strange bump at an extremity of the basket, right below your face. It looks like a big shell, maybe kind of scallop-shell, very red and swollen. But the think that surprises you is the fact it is leaking a strange gooey fluid constantly. Is it the way the aliens mean to feed you? You dare to brush the spot with a paw to collect some of the fluid, and lick it: gosh, you are astounded by the taste. You never had the chance to eat something that good in all your life. You don’t know if it’s a trick or not, but this little sample reawakened your hunger, and at your stage of hopelessness, it’s not even worth to wonder any more. So, you fling yourself on the shell and lick voraciously. On the moment, you don’t notice the whirring appearing again, but you see that the shell is opening because of your lingual actions, and a strange tubular lump in the middle is emerging to your face, clearly the source of all this delicious fluid. You lick your lips hungrily, not thinking anymore and entirely driven by your taste, then you gobble it to the roots. You had barely the time to suckle once or twice that a huge tremor shakes your home, while a huge noise resonates around you.
1512111221.title: The fun is still to come

15121112211.content:
All along your trek, the cat had been “watching” for you. She could trace your progression cm by cm, looking amorously at her backside while rubbing it gently. But at a moment, she had felt you slowing down, until you finally stopped, somewhere in the middle of her womb. She couldn’t figure out what happened to you, but it was out of question to fail so near to the objective. So, she decided to give you a little help. She raised her butt slowly upward, until she almost walked on her head, her body almost vertical. She felt clearly that the gravity helped you to finish the way, but you moved at such a great speed compared to earlier that she was a bit surprised.
A few moments later, she felt you stop in a very deep place, just a few inches from her itching spot. She was almost drooling from the excitation as she felt you dive through the last gate, and then you emerged inside her precious spot. Gosh, each of your steps in there already made her thrill of excitation. But when you climbed inside the inner fleshy basket, she got instantly wet, your touch feeling like the most sensual rub she ever received. Her fur bristled while she was lounging in her own basket, purring like a motor: was an orgasm really like that? She wondered how she could have lived all these years without it. But she had yet felt nothing… it’s this moment you chose to suckle the source of her itch, the very heart of her pleasure need. Despite all her efforts to contain herself until there, she couldn’t fight the sensation anymore, and she let out the most voluptuous meow of her life.
“Mreeeoooowwwww!!! Yes, keep going, Master”, she thought fervently, only devoted to her inner pleasure.

But at her great surprise, she hears her master answering to her directly in her mind:
“Who said that? Who are you? Are you the one who is jailing me here?” the human say, inquisitive. On your side, you were looking curiously around you, seeking for the one who is talking to you so clearly, but the room is totally empty, beside you.
Meanwhile, your cat is getting impatient because your questioning makes you stop suckling, and she is devoured by lust currently. She judged it was probably better to answer you for good, and thus, to resume all the faster this pleasuring activity.

“Master, listen to me attentively: I am your cat, Lila”. She lets you time to be able to swallow the news.

You were absolutely staggered by what you heard. Were the aliens screwing with you? And why would they do that?
- But I don’t understand. Where are you exactly? I hear but can’t see you. And besides, how are you able to talk, since you’re a cat? And what tell me you are really what you pretend to be?” you said dubiously
Lila sighs
- I am really your cat. Each morning, after you get up, you fap for twenty minutes before to leave the house. I’m the only one who can know that.”
It was right. It’s the kind of activity you never talked about to anybody, and the only witness was your cat, since you didn’t fear she let “herself” out of the bag (yes, bad pun). However, maybe they just spied every details of your life, even the more sordid ones.

Because you were in such a sensitive place, Lila could feel your mistrust. She tries to convince you.
- Listen, I’m really your cat. We played together many times, you fed me, even slept with me on your side. You took good care of me. But you never let me have sex, nor release my heat, and I got very frustrated. So, the other night, I decided to satisfy myself and it happens that, in some magic way, I unbirthed you. For a while, I thought you were lost, but today, you reappeared microscopical in my womb, and I managed to make you end in a very deep place inside my body. Maybe there is a link with the fact that we are able to telepath currently. But I don’t care: the most important is that you are now in the very spot which has been itching me for all these years, and I need you to scratch it for me, please. Continue what you were doing earlier” She purred, demanding.

For a moment, you say nothing: you were swallowing very hardly what the voice just said. It was so surrealist. But, now that she’s talking about it, you remember this night when you had strange dreams, and this musky scent all around you. It smelled familiar on the moment, but now, you recognize unmistakably this fragrance filling all the room since Lila got aroused. It was your cat’ scent, you suffered enough of her noisy and reeking heat to be certain of it.
So, as unbelievable it is, it was the truth: your cat had shrunk you magically and unbirthed you just to make of you a living dildo. From what you’ve seen and heard, you were apparently inside her ovary, the famous “itching spot” she talked about. Retrospectively, you find it very disgusting to think you fully trekked her reproductive system. But the worst is to think she made you go through it. How your beloved pet could have dared to do it to you.

You yell to her
- Why Lila, why did you do that? I was a good owner, wasn’t I? I never molested you?” You cry, beside yourself.
- Oh, don’t talk about molestation. For all these years, I’ve been very patient to endure heat after heat, never getting any relief from any one. You cloistered me in the house so that I couldn’t flirt with stray cats, and you systemically rejected my advances. I was trapped from both sides. My paws and tongue were not enough to get satisfaction. You never looked after my sexual health. Well, from now on, it will be your only occupation.”
The tubular lump twitches in front of you, like if to emphasize her point. You were hypnotized by his pendulum swing, enticing you to gobble it. But you shake your head, determined to fight this sensation. You hop out of the basket, and head to the exit.
- I’ll never be your toy, Lila. I’ll extract myself of you, and seek for help from my fellows to recover my normal size. After that, I’ll euthanize you”, you declare coldly.
Lila pulls a face at your words. It’s not that she takes your threats seriously, but it shows that her human was psychologically stronger than she thought. But she was well aware of her superiority for now.
- And where are you going, my little pet? If you didn’t notice, you are trapped inside my body, deep under tons of muscles, fat and fur at your scale. I can feel it”.
She pats her abdomen, above your location. From the inside, you couldn’t deny that it sounds very distant.
- Well, I’ll just retrace my steps and takes the natural exit”, you reply sarcastically.
You go in front of the entrance of the ovary and try to push in the middle. But, surprisingly, the flesh doesn’t move in this way. You push with all your strength, but there is nothing to do: the only exit is blocked.
- Looks like my body is not in the mood to let you out, and nor am I”, she states while she readjusts in her basket to be in a more comfortable position.”Now, I am the master, you are the pet, and my whole body is your house, or rather your jail, because it’s my turn to cloister you.”
- No, it’s different, you can’t threaten me, as much as I can’t threaten you” you angrily correct.
- You have a point, but”…. She stretches lasciviously, “I’m free to move wherever I want, while on your side, you are perfectly jailed in me”. She can feel her master shudders from rage deep in there. It looks like she better uses the psychological warfare.
Then, she has an idea:
- Aren’t you hungry? Because I am?”
She gets up and goes to your fridge see what still remains of your supplies. She’s smart enough to open the door herself, and thus, begins to make her choice. You’re outraged she dares to help herself with your own food, but what can you do in the present situation?
- Well, there’s not that much since you have ‘disappeared’, but I see some chicken wings and breast. I think it’s one of your favorite meals, isn’t it?”
She picks one with her dexterous paw and devours it ravenously; taking care to make lots of noise so you can hear it.
Deep inside, on both meanings, it’s right that you feel under the weather. You are terribly hungry, on the verge of starvation. But there’s nothing to do, either you manage to get out; either you resign yourself to suckle on her ‘love shell’, bringing some sort of sexual excitation to her against your will. You try again to open the exit, but it looks like it’s perfectly shut, not moving an inch under your action, exactly like this other “valve”, that you guess to be her cervix from now. You understand how fool it was to travel deeper, each door closing behind you.

- Oh, looks what I’ve found… a chocolate cake” she falsely exclaim.
It was the truth: you had stored a cake for you girlfriend’s birthday some days ago. But you never had the occasion to offer it, finally. Your cat didn’t touch it because she isn’t particularly fond of chocolate, but if it can subdue your mind, why not use it.
- It looks very delicious. I’ll take a taste, if you allow it. But how couldn’t you refuse, ha ha”. She plays again, mischievous.
She guzzles, chewing even more loudly. You can hear everything, her mastication, her swallow. You imagine all this delicious food piling right in the cavity above you. But you can’t access to it, there is absolutely no way, even if you cat wanted. You are trapped in this fleshy room, without any other subsistence than this damned lump. No, “don’t even consider it”, you think. You try to plug your ears, but the noise is too strong.
- Mmmph, I would really like to share, but, I fear there is absolutely no way that I give even one morsel to you” she feigns to regret. “Except…”
She lies on her back and spread some of the cake on her belly, paying particular attention to her abdomen, then begins to lick it directly on herself.
This little pest! From the inside, you could distinctly hear the brushing motion of her tongue on her fur, right above your location. You couldn’t help imagining all this delicious chocolate flowing in her mouth, and down her throat.
15121112211.title: prisoner of your own pet

info.brief_description: A cat is going to be your new mother, and you will be her kitten, willing or not.
info.description:
You love your cat and feel bad for her because she has never been able to be a mother. When you were younger, she was spayed and because of that she never had the chance to become a mother. Or maybe she is kept inside, away from male cats all the time, so she is unable to be bred. Or maybe you are unwilling and your cat forces you to be her kitten. Any of those options or more is fine. The only thing I don't want to see is:
No gay stuff
Please use the best grammar that you can. I will edit for grammar, but not content unless a rule is disobeyed
Besides that, everything is fine
